description:
After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed’s back to her home. Furious, Luffy reveals himself to Kaido and starts to retaliate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein gnadenloser Kampf! Ruffy gegen Kaido!
Enfin, la rencontre. Luffy, enragé, défie Kaido !
Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Moukou Luffy vs Kaidou
اصطدما أخيرًا! لوفي الكاسر ضدّ كايدو!
遂に激突 猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ
